headline: Assessing O'Reilly Automotive (ORLY) Valuation as Shares Quietly Log Strong Gains Without Major News
summary: O'Reilly Automotive (ORLY) has caught the attention of many investors recently, as its stock has quietly notched strong gains across multiple timeframes. There hasn't been a major company announcement or industry event. The continued move upward may have some shareholders and would-be buyers wondering if something is shifting below the surface. The absence of a definitive trigger adds to the curiosity and leaves many considering if this run is driven by underlying fundamentals or simply...
